promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi young special lizard dark-type pokemon wearing white gemstones. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gemdrakoon, a a chibi young special lizard dark-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Reinforced Headbutt, Happy Turn. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lizard", "dark" or "Gemdrakoon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, lizard-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: Known for its cuddly appearance, this cave-dweller uses Reinforced Headbutt to shatter rocks. Its Happy Turn brightens even the gloomiest caves.
